00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ArrayFileReaderTest );
00031 
00032 #define TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE "../data/file_does_not_exist";
00033 #define TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID "../data/test.file.data_header_only"
00034 #define TEST_DATA_FILE "../data/ArraySetFile.xml"

00050 void ArrayFileReaderTest::CheckArrayData(bool headerOnly)
00051 {
00052         ArrayFileReader reader;
00053         ArrayData array;
00054         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, array, headerOnly) == true);
00056 
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.DataTypeIdentifier() == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string("432-432-432-432"));
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedStep() == ArrayRegistrationStep);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.InitialProject() == L"my_project");
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 9:00AM");
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00063 
00064         if (headerOnly)
00065                 return;
00066 
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00068 
00069         ArrayAttributes &atts = array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0];
00070 
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Identifier() == "123-123-123-123");
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayName() == "mychip");
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayBarcode() == "@1234567890");
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Media() == PlateOrStripMedia);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaRow() == 1);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaCol() == 12);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFile() == "Test3.master");
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFileId() == "123-123-123-123");
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.PatAssignment() == AffyBarcodeAssignment);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 10:00AM");
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedStep() == ScanningStep);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Comment() == L"here is a comment");
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.LibraryPackageName() == "libpackage");
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaFileGUID() == "mediaguid");
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaFileName() == "mediafile");
00087 
00088         ParameterNameValuePairVector &params = atts.Attributes();
00089         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator paramIt = params.begin();
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( params.size() == 2);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"SampleID");
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"433232");
00093         ++paramIt;
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"LIMS System");
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"Nautilis");
00096 
00097 
00098         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = array.UserAttributes();
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 6 );
00100 
00101         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Species" );
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Homo Sapien" );
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == true );
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00107         ++userIt;
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Individual" );
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"me" );
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00113         ++userIt;
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"When" );
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"now" );
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TimeParameterType);
00119         ++userIt;
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"How much" );
00121         const double eps = 1e-5;
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userIt).GetValueFloat(), 1.0, eps);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00126         ++userIt;
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sex" );
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00131 
00132         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cit = (*userIt).ControlMultiValues().begin();
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00134         ++cit;
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00136 
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 4 );
00138         cit = (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00140         ++cit;
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Female" );
00142         ++cit;
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Unknown" );
00144         ++cit;
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00146         ++userIt;
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Age" );
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"30 something" );
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00152         ++userIt;
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (userIt == userParams.end() );
00154 
00155 }

00157 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read()
00158 {
00159         CheckArrayData(false);
00160 }
00161 
00162 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_header_data_only()
00163 {
00164         CheckArrayData(true);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_does_not_exist()
00168 {
00169         ArrayFileReader reader;
00170         ArrayData array;
00171         std::string name = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, array) == false);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_is_not_valid()
00176 {
00177         ArrayFileReader reader;
00178         ArrayData array;
00179         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, array) == false);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_IsFileType()
00184 {
00185         std::string file;
00186 
00187         file = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ArrayFileReader::IsFileType(file, ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00189 
00190         file = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ArrayFileReader::IsFileType(file, ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00192 
00193         file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ArrayFileReader::IsFileType(file, ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == true );
00195 }
00196 
00197 void ArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_DataTypeIdentifierStatic()
00198 {
00199         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00200         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType guid;
00201         guid = ArrayFileReader::DataTypeIdentifier(name);
00202 
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(guid == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00204 }
